Rulings.Tengu:
●Woodland Sprite gives you the ability to send Equip Spell Cards equipped to it to the GY. Sending them to the GY for this specific purpose is the only way to activate the effect and inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent.
●This card’s effect can only be activated during your Main Phase, but may be activated more than once per turn.
●An Equip Spell Card sent to the GY by this card’s effect is not destroyed. So the effects of Butterfly Dagger – Elma, Axe of Despair, Malevolent Nuzzler, Blast with Chain, or Smoke Grenade of the Thief cannot or will not be activated.
●If you send Black Pendant to the GY with this card’s effect, the effect of Black Pendant will activate, because it does not have to be destroyed, just sent to the GY.
●You can activate Premature Burial to Special Summon Woodland Sprite from your GY, and then its effect to send Premature Burial to the GY and Woodland Sprite will remain on the field. This is because Premature Burial was not destroyed.
●If you opponent activates Snatch Steal and equips it to your Woodland Sprite, they may choose to activate its effect and send Snatch Steal to the GY. You will take 500 damage, and then control of Woodland Sprite would return to you.

●If you opponent activates Snatch Steal and equips it to your Woodland Sprite, they may choose to activate its effect and send Snatch Steal to the GY. You will take 500 damage, and then control of Woodland Sprite would return to you. 12/06/03 Woodland Sprite” sends cards to the GY. It does not destroy them.

Rulings.Cat:
● 'Woodland Sprite' gives you the ability to send Equip Spell Cards equipped to it to the GY. Sending them to the GY for this specific purpose is the only way to activate the effect and inflict 500 damage to your opponent.
● This card’s effect can only be activated during your Main Phase, but may be activated more than once per turn.
● An Equip Spell Card sent to the GY by this card’s effect isn't 'destroyed'. So the effects of 'Butterfly Dagger – Elma', 'Axe of Despair', 'Malevolent Nuzzler', 'Blast with Chain', or 'Smoke Grenade of the Thief' can't or will not be activated. 
● If you send 'Black Pendant' to the GY with this card’s effect, the effect of 'Black Pendant' will activate, because it does not have to be 'destroyed', just sent to the GY.
● You can activate 'Premature Burial' to Special Summon 'Woodland Sprite' from your GY, and then its effect to send 'Premature Burial' to the GY and 'Woodland Sprite' will remain on the field. This is because 'Premature Burial' was not destroyed.
● If you opponent activates 'Snatch Steal' and equips it to your 'Woodland Sprite', they may choose to activate its effect and send 'Snatch Steal' to the GY. You will take 500 damage, and then control of 'Woodland Sprite' would return to you.

Rulings.Base:
1. "Woodland Sprite" gives you the ability to send Equip Spell Cards equipped to it to the GY. Sending them to the GY for this specific purpose is the only way to activate the effect and inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent.
2. This card's effect can only be activated during your Main Phase, but may be activated more than once per turn.
3. An Equip Spell Card sent to the GY by this card's effect is not "destroyed". So the effects of "Butterfly Dagger - Elma", "Axe of Despair", "Malevolent Nuzzler", "Blast with Chain", or "Smoke Grenade of the Thief" cannot or will not be activated.
4. If you send "Black Pendant" to the GY with this card's effect, the effect of "Black Pendant" will activate, because it does not have to be "destroyed", just sent to the GY.
5. You can activate "Premature Burial" to Special Summon "Woodland Sprite" from your GY, and then its effect to send "Premature Burial" to the GY and "Woodland Sprite" will remain on the field. This is because "Premature Burial" was not destroyed.
6. If you opponent activates "Snatch Steal" and equips it to your "Woodland Sprite", they may choose to activate its effect and send "Snatch Steal" to the GY. You will take 500 damage, and then control of "Woodland Sprite" would return to you.
